text: Dang xianzhi sixia ba yi jian shi toulu gei ta de yi wei qizi [ha fu sa] shi, ta bian ba ta xielou gei bieren [zhu][zhi mu sheng de ling yi wei qizi a yi sha]. Dang an la shi ta [mu sheng] zhidao xiemi shijian shi,[zhihou] ta [mu sheng] jiu rang ta zhidao yibufen, er baomi yibufen. Dang ta [mu sheng] ba xiemi shijian gaosu ta [ha fu sa] shi, ta shuo:“Zhe shi shei gaosu ni de?” Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Shi quanzhi de, che zhi de zhu [an la] gaosu wo de.”
